mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (member_id, password, name, birth, address, address_detail, zip, phone, email, point) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, TO_DATE(#{birth}, 'YYYYMMDD'), #{address}, #{addressDetail}, #{zip}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{point})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM member WHERE member_id = #{id} AND password = #{password}
mapper.select: SELECT member_id AS id, password, name, birth, address, address_detail AS addressDetail, zip, phone, email, point FROM member WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
